sentences.sContent: She is young and physically fit.
Do you find him physically attractive?
I felt physically sick at the thought.
sentences.sCn: 一想到那个我就觉得身体不舒服。

sentences.sContent: children who have been physically abused
...And physically interacting with an object makes you more committed to your purchase...
...Just physically passing the book showed a big difference in sales...
...and there are a lot of jokes about people who are too fat or physically handicapped...

phrases.pCn: 不安的，担心的；不舒服的

words.tran: [物] 物理的；身体的；物质的

trans.tranOther: in relation to your body rather than your mind or emotions
